newsitem.title: UK: NWE gas oil prices flat after Easter weekend.
newsitem.headline: NWE gas oil prices flat after Easter weekend.

text.p: Gas oil was unchanged on Tuesday, still quiet after the long Easter weekend, traders said.
April IPE gas oil was steady at $166.75 a tonne in thin volume.

Heating barge premiums were marginally easier with first half April material offered at April IPE +50 cents, about 50 cents stronger. Barge dealers said demand was very slow with the warm Easter weather bearish.
Cargo premiums were unchanged from last week. Traders said they expected more activity later in the day and towards the end of the week.
Russian cargoes were steady around April IPE +$1 cif NWE while FOD was pegged at April IPE +$2.
Diesel was expected to come under more presure after trade last week of April IPE +9.50 cif NWE.
